thread.title: Wayne Rooney being lined up by Chinese Super League in stunning £1m A WEEK deal after breaking Manchester United scoring record

author: sunsportonline
title: Wayne Rooney being lined up by Chinese Super League in stunning £1m A WEEK deal after breaking Manchester United scoring record
text:
EFL China calling Wayne Rooney being lined up by Chinese Super League in stunning £1m A WEEK deal after breaking Manchester United scoring record 
The Red Devils captain scored his 250th goal for the club against Stoke City, and is a wanted man in the Far East Exclusive
